Posts.Content: Oct 26, 2011 01:39PM EricaH wrote: Use Artificial Tears (or similar) regularly.  Block tear ducts causes the dripping (sounds odd, but it is the tear ducts behind the eye that are blocked so the tears have to escape out the front!).  Extra tear production is caused by dry eyes - if you keep them lubricated with the Artificial Tears you won't have so much trouble.  HTH!
Posts.Title: Super teary eyes vtellen grayfran
